scenes.one_liner: Ela monitors radio static alone at a moonlit highway radio tent.
Ela deciphers Marcus’s urgent coordinates, preparing to send rescue.
Flashback: Marcus struggles inside damaged spacecraft amid sparking hazards.
Sheriff Miller drives determinedly along Desolation Road toward crash site.
Sheriff Miller and Ela find injured Marcus, initiating first aid rescue.
Ela and Sheriff Miller reflect quietly as dawn breaks over tent.
